title: Senthoora Song Lyrics English Meaning
stanzas:
Senthoora Song Lyrics English Meaning Bogan
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
nithaa nithaa
nithaanamaaga
yosithaalum

nillaa nillaa
nillaamal odi
yosithaalum

neethaan manam
thaedum maanbaalan
poovaai enai
yendhum boopaalan
en madiyin
manavaalan
ena thondrudhe

[senthoora aa aah
sernthe selvom
senthoora aa aah
sengaanthal poo
un thaeraa

maaran ambu
aindhum vaithu
ondraai kaattril
eithaaiyaa] (2)

nadakkayil
anaithavaaru
poga vendum

viralgalai
pinaithavaaru
pesavendum

kaalai ezhumpodhu
nee vendum.
thookkam varumpodhu
thol vendum.

nee piriyaa
varam thandhaal
adhuve podhum

senthoora aa aah
sernthe selvom
senthoora aa aah
sengaanthal poo
un thaeraa

maaran ambu
aindhum vaithu
ondraai kaattril
eithaaiyaa
senthoora aa aah

mazhaiyin iravil
oru kudaiyinil
nadappomaa

marathin adiyil
manikanakkinil
kathaipomaa

paadal ketpomaa
paadi paarpomaa
moolgathaan
vendaamaa

yaarum kaanaatha
inbam ellaame
kaiyyil vandhe
vilumaa..

nee indri
ini ennaal irundhida
mudinthidumaa

senthoora aa aah
sernthe selvom
senthoora aa aah
sengaanthal poo
un thaeraa

maaran ambu
aindhum vaithu
ondraa kaattril
eithaaiyaa
senthoora aa aah

alainthu naan kalaithu
pogumpothu alli
melindhu naan ilaithu
povathaaga solli.

veettil nalamaaga
seiyvaayaa
poiyyaai silaneram
vaivaayaa

naan tholainthaal
unaiserum vazhi
solvaayaa?

senthoora aa aah
sernthe selvom
senthoora aa aah
sengaanthal poo
un thaeraa

maaran ambu
aindhum vaithu
ondraai kaattril
eithaaiyaa
eithaaiyaa

kangal sokka seithaayaa
kaiyyil saaya
solvaayaa

yeno aachu
veppam moochu
vetkangal poye pochu..		English Meaning
I tried my best :)
Even When
thinking
leisurely

Even when
Thinking
In busy time.

You are the one
My heart searches for.
You are the one
Who hold like a flower
It appears you’re
A bridegroom in
My lap.

A man like safflower..
Lets go together..
A man like safflower..
Is Sengandhal flower
your chariot ?

Did you shoot
all  five arrows
With Maran’s
bow ?

Should
Always walk
Like a couple.

Should talk
Always by binding
Our Fingers

Need you while
Waking in morning.
Need you shoulder
While sleeping..

Its enough
If you give
No breaking boon

A man like safflower..
Lets go together..
A man like safflower..
Is Sengandhal flower
your chariot ?

Did you shoot
all  five arrows
With Maran’s
bow ?
A man like safflower..

Lets walk
Together in rain
With one umbrella

Let’s talk
Under a tree
for long time.

Let,s listen to song
Let’s try singing
Don’t we have
to drown

all the desires,
that no body has been,
Will it come to
Our hands ?

without you
I can no longer
live myself.

A man like safflower..
Lets go together..
A man like safflower..
Is Sengandhal flower
your chariot ?

Did you shoot
all  five arrows
With Maran’s
bow ?
A man like safflower..

You will take me
While I’m exhausted.
You’ll tell that
I have gone lean.

you would take care
Of me at home.
You would scold
me sometimes.

Tell me the way to
reach you when
I get lost.

A man like safflower..
Lets go together..
A man like safflower..
Is Sengandhal flower
your chariot ?

Did you shoot
all  five arrows
With Maran’s
bow ?
Did you shoot...

You amazed me,
Let me lie on your
Hands

Something happened
Breath is hot.
Shyness has gone.
